- Github -

Heritrix3 development has moved to github: https://github.com/internetarchive/heritrix3

The archive-crawler-cvs list should receive email when checkins are made to github. Unfortunately the messages from github currently don't include diffs. (It is possible to make this work from outside of github, but doesn't look worth the effort to maintain.)

(Heritrix1 development, if there is any more, remains in sourceforge.)

- Home Page -

The canonical home page for Heritrix is now the wiki: https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix

The old home page http://crawler.archive.org/ now redirects to the wiki. The old content is still available for reference at http://crawler.archive.org/index.html. Generally old content that is still useful is linked from the wiki home page, so look there first.

- Javadoc -

Javadoc API docs are online for current releases and development snapshots: http://builds.archive.org:8080/javadoc/
Snapshot docs should be kept up to date automatically.

Noah
